item.title: Welcome to the panic room
item.dc:creator: Jefferson Smith
item.description:
Yes, you're in the right place. Unfortunately, the project is just getting started so I don't have anything to tell you yet.

I expect to get things started this week with a (slightly) interactive table of all the crops I've studied, but for now, you'll have to wait.

(Hopefully this is not yet a real emergency. If it is; if society has already collapsed and you're still seeing this placeholder, then chances are good that I didn't make it. Sorry about that. Good luck with the gasoline hooligans.)
